org.javautil.document.style
Class FontAttributesImpl

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      java.util.TreeMap<String,String>
          org.javautil.document.style.FontAttributesImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Map<String,String>, NavigableMap<String,String>, SortedMap<String,String>, FontAttributes
public class FontAttributesImpl
extends TreeMap<String,String>
implements FontAttributes

Basic implementation of FontAttributes taking most of its functionality from java.util.TreeMap.

Author:
bcm
